description: This file declares the exported API functions for a content filtering basic message object component in a BroadWay Service Delivery System. It includes function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the component.
external_files: an example of included external headers might be <some_header.h>, but none are explicitly included

methods.name: CfBasicMsgComponentCreate
methods.description: Creates a new content filtering basic message component object with specified container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: CfBasicMsgCOCreate
methods.description: Creates a new instance of the content filtering message object.

methods.name: CfBasicMsgCORemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the specific content filtering message object instance.

methods.name: CfBasicMsgCOEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls or registers necessary objects for the component.
